title: Happy Valentine's Day
author: verias
text:
And wouldn't you know it? Sick as a dog.

I like this piece so much, I am contemplating making this one a full color piece for my personal Patreon.

What do you guys think?

You can check it out over at http://www.patreon.com/verias

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text:
Sounds good.

Do it.

I won't see it, since since, because i can't afford to do all the Patreons i'd like to, and choosing between them would be too frustrating, i don't do Patreon at all.
